content: lion brand pattern # 60030 skill level intermediate + level 4 microspun article #910 4 colors 5 balls total *coral lily white mocha mango * crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm clutch is worked flat in one piece then seamed bobble functions as a button lace along with rosettes leaves bobbles and flower are worked separately then sewn onto the clutch using photo as a guide
